      Methods in game that return Suit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Suit Player.chooseTrump()
      Chooses a suit to be trump based on quantity of bowers in hand and/or frequency of suits.

      Private helper method to assist in AI functions.
      Suit Card.getSuit() 
      Suit EuchreGame.getTrump()
      Returns the current trump suit.

      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
